It is amazing how much and fast you learn if you have such a large variety of projects.Â You see others code, their code smell and there cleverness. You can always learn from it.

My Co-worker and I started from scratch as it was clear that the showcase version was only a quickly coded prototype. With the management team introducing scrum to our workflow we managed to finish the application just in time. Loewe Assist Media for iPhone will be submitted to the App Store very soon.
Financing my education and learning by doing.
